desc: Disposable color remediation filter cartridges for the botanical extraction industry. CRC BHO extraction filters, housings, multi packs, and accessories. AFS Filter Colorado Springs, CO.

layout.text: AFS Filters are the first and only disposable color remediation filter cartridges for the botanical extraction industry. Our Patent Pending design allows for an easy to use solution implemented into existing extraction systems; and is now available as a standard integration from many equipment manufacturers.
